18367.「帰りたい……。帰りたい……。: I want to go home... I want to go home...

18368.「この子さ なーんも話さないの。\n ラチ あかないから\n 聞きだすのは もう:
She won't talk to me. I've given up trying to
find out what she has to say.

18369.「まあ ご飯は しっかり食べてるから\n 身体のほうは 大丈夫みたいだけどね。:
Well, he's eating well, so his body seems to
be fine.

18371.「あたしね 最近ずっと\n 暗黒大樹と魔瘴の関連性っていう\n 論文を 書いてる:
I've been writing a paper on the relationship
between Dark Trees and demon miasma.

18372.「暗黒大樹が 魔瘴に及ぼす影響を\n 研究してるんだけどさ。\n ちょっと 手伝:
I'm studying the effects of the Dark Tree on
demon miasma. Can you help me...

18374.「な…なにっ！？\n いきなり 大声なんか出して\n びっくりしたんだけど！:
What? You startled me when you suddenly
started yelling!

18375.「暗黒大樹に行くの……？: Are you going to Dark Tree...?

18376.「うん。あたしじゃないけどね。\n <pc>に 大樹付近の魔瘴を\n 調査しても:
Yeah, it's not me. It's not me, though. I was
thinking of having <pc> investigate
the demon miasma near the big tree.

18380.「……そんなに 行きたいの？: Do you want to go that badly?

18382.「やれやれ。不思議な子ね。\n なんか 意志が固いみたいだし\n しょうがないっ:
Oh, dear. She's a strange girl. She seems to
have a strong will, so I guess it can't be
helped.

18383.「<pc>。頼みが あるんだけど。\n 暗黒大樹に行って その付近の魔瘴が\n:
<pc>. Can you do me a favor? Could
you go to the Dark Tree and find out what's
going on with the demon miasma in that area?

18384.「この子も 一緒にってことになりそうだけど\n どう？ お願いできるかな？:
I think we're going to have to take her with
us. Can you do that for me?

18385.「サンキュー。\n そんじゃ ひとつ よろしく～。:
Thank you. Well then, I'm looking forward to
working with you.

18388.「なんか あせってるわね。\n どうしちゃったのかしら。:
You seem to be in a big hurry. I wonder what's
wrong.

18389.「暗黒大樹まで けっこう遠いけど\n よろしくね <pc>。:
It's a long way to Dark Tree, but I look
forward to working with you <pc>.

18390.「サンキュー。\n そんじゃ ひとつ よろしく～。:
Thank you. Well then, I'm looking forward to
working with you.

18391.「……って あなた ほかの人たちの\n 頼まれごとを たくさん抱えてるみたいね。:
You seem to be doing a lot of favors for other
people. I didn't know you had such a loose
cannon personality...

18392.「あたしのは 後でいいから\n 先に そっちを片付けてきて 大丈夫よ。: You can take care of mine later.

18393.「おおっと そうきたかー。\n あ いいよ。別に 気にしてないし。:
Oh, that's what I thought. Ah, it's okay. I
don't mind.

18394.「ホント言うと あなた 頼りになるから\n 手伝ってくれると うれしいんだけどね:
To tell you the truth, I would be happy if you
would help me because you are reliable. Hmm, I
wonder what I should do.

18396.「さっそく 頼みが あるんだけど。\n 暗黒大樹に行って その付近の魔瘴が\n:
I have a favor to ask you right away. Would
you go to the Dark Tree and find out what's
going on with the demon miasma in that area?

18397.「この子も 一緒になんだけど\n どう？ お願いできるかな？: I'd like to bring her with me. Would you mind?

18401.「い…今の 見たでしょ？\n ボク 魔瘴の中でも 平気だよ。\n だから ここで:
Did you see that? I'm okay with demon miasma.
I can live here forever.

18402.「ムリだ。\n お前 耐えられるの うすい魔瘴だけ。:
I can't. You can only endure weak demon
miasma.

18403.「もうすぐ 大樹\n 濃い魔瘴で 包まれる。\n その時 お前 死ぬだけ。:
Soon, it will be enveloped in a thick demon
miasma. At that time, you'll just die.

18406.「ここを 追いだされたら\n ボ…ボク どこへ行けば……。:
If they kick me out of here, I don't know
where I'll go.

18409.「き…聞こえてた？\n 大樹の長……。今のが ボクのパパだよ。: Did you hear me? Tree Chief... that's my dad.

18410.「ボク パパに拾われて\n 小さいころから\n ずっと ここで育ったの。:
He took me in, and I've lived here ever
since I was little.

18411.「でも 大きくなって パパに言われたの。\n エルフが ここにいるべきでないって:
But when I got older, my dad told me. Elf
shouldn't be here. He kicked me out of the big
tree.

18413.「あの博士さんのところに 帰るの？\n ボクも 行く……。:
Are you going back to that doctor? I'm going
with him.

28645.「へへ。\n あんたも ちゃんと 戻ってきたわね。\n おかえりなさい。:
Heh. You came back properly, too. Welcome
back.

28646.「で 暗黒大樹付近の魔瘴は どうなってた？\n あたしの予測が 正しければ\n:
So, how was the demon miasma near the Dark
Tree? If I'm right, there should be an
increase.

28647.「……うーん やっぱりね。\n 魔瘴が 増えてたか。: I knew it. Demon miasma has increased.

28648.「暗黒大樹が 活性化して\n エルトナの大地に 影響を与えている……。:
The Dark Tree has been activated and is
affecting the land of Eltona...

28649.「暗黒大樹の活性化による 魔瘴の飛び火現象。\n やばいわね。イムイ地下空洞に発:
The phenomenon of miasma caused by the activation of the Dark Tree. Oh no. Is that also the reason for the miasma occurring in
the Imui Underground Cave? I'll have to put it in the king's ear...

28650.「っと ごめんね。あたし 夢中になると\n ひとり言 しゃべっちゃうの。:
I'm sorry. I talk to myself when I get carried
away.

28651.「サンキュー。助かったわ。\n これは あたしからの お礼ね。:
Thank you. You've been very helpful. This is
my way of saying thank you.

28652.「そういえば この子\n 暗黒大樹に行きたがってたけど\n 結局 なにか わかっ:
Oh, by the way, this girl wanted to go to Dark
Tree, but did you find out anything in the
end?

28653.「……マジで？\n この子 暗黒大樹で\n 大樹の番人に 育てられていたの？:
Seriously? This girl was raised by the Dark
Tree Guardian?

28654.「これは びっくりだわ。\n ずっと研究してるから 暗黒大樹のことは\n ほとん:
This is a surprise. I thought I knew most of
what was going on with Dark Tree since I've
been studying it for so long, but...

28655.「まさか 大樹の番人が エルフの子供を\n 育てる思いやりを 持っていたなんて\:
I never knew that the Keeper of the Trees had
the compassion to raise Elf children.

28658.「か…帰る家が なくなっちゃった……。\n パパにも 追いだされて……。:
I don't have a home anymore... and my dad
kicked me out...

28659.「ううう……。ボ…ボク……。\n これから どうすれば……。: B-but what am I going to do now?

28660.「あはは。なーんだ。\n ここにいれば いいんじゃない？:
Ha-ha. What the heck. Why don't you just stay
here?

28662.「だって あんた エルフでしょ？\n エルフが エルフの世界で生きるのは\n 自:
Because you're an Elf, right? It is natural
for Elf to live in the Elf world.

28663.「まあ なにもしないで 居座られても困るから\n すこしは 手伝ってもらうけど。:
Well, I don't want you to stay here without doing anything, so I'm going to ask you to help me a little bit. I'll have you help me
with my research and all that~.

28665.「さーてと 調査の続きっと。\n それじゃ またね。<pc>。:
Well, I'll continue with the investigation.
See you later. <pc>.

28669.「へぇ。ハッパっていうんだ。\n かっこいい名前じゃん。: Wow. It's called Happa. That's a cool name.

28670.「えへへ よろしくね。ハッパ。: Hehehe, nice to meet you. Happa.

28672.「あたしさ 今から調査に行くけど\n よかったら 一緒に来る？:
I'm going to do some research now, if you want
to come with me.
